articles.title: Nikki Haley says ‘smart’ India doesn't trust US: ‘I have talked with Modi…’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In an interview, Indian-American US president aspirant Nikki Haley said as of now India sees the United States as weak. | World News
articles.content: Nikki Haley, an aspiring Republican presidential candidate, claimed that India wants to be a partner with the US, but as of now, it doesn't trust Americans to lead. Nikki Haley added that India has p… [+1956 chars]
